extendedInfo.description: â©â©â©The Bear Tombs have been opened! Grumpy Mummies, Pharaohs, and Gods have been unleashed upon the world and after such a long sleep... they are very hungry for honey! Protect your truck from a Bear-rage of forces with new weapons!â©â©â©There be some grumpy teddy bears in the woods, and they be wantin' your honey!Now you must defend your barrels of honey at all cost. Luckily you have a wide variety of weapons and defense systems to do just that. Being a honey delivery truck has never been so dangerous and SO FUN!Fight off the teddy bears and put up your best defenses to keep those grumpy teddies at bay.Huge, family fun with tons of fur and explosions.Things you can throw at them grumpy teddy bears include:â© Sticks o' Dynamiteâ© Skully McGee's UberBombsâ© Bear Seeking Grenadesâ© Dad's Pile o' Wrenchesâ© Trusty Hay Balesâ© Molotov Cocktailsâ© Your Pet Rock (not recommended)Also be sure to check out these crazy tools of destruction:â® The Electric Fenceâ® The Nukeâ® The Hammer of Thunderâ® The Flaming Hay BaleTeddy Bears you can unlock include:â® Ninjaâ® Lumberjackâ® Panda...and many, many more!Good luck and have fun!âââââ âGreat game to pass the time. Crazy bears...love how they taunt you and end up getting blown sky high! Definitely a fun game!ââ®â®â®â®â® âMy uncle told me about this game. BY FAR THE BEST GAME EVER!ââââââ âThe best FUN! All the way around...The way games were intended. Whether you're winning or losing, it really doesn't matter...you'll just keep coming back for more...A real keeper.ââ¤ Play Grumpy Bears today!âLikeâ Grumpy Bears on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GrumpyBears___________________________Grumpy Bears is brought to you by Fluik Entertainment, makers of wicked-fun mobile games such as Office Jerk, Office Zombie and Plumber Crack. Browse all our games on Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=FluikFollow @FluikGames on Twitter for awesome game announcements and other updates.NOTE:To help keep Grumpy Bears awesome, please send any bug reports or complaints directly to us, instead of posting them in your app reviews. We can reply to app reviews on Google Play, but we're more likely to respond if you post all your bugs or suggestions on the Facebook fan page, http://www.facebook.com/GrumpyBears, or email them to us at support@fluik.com

reviews.title: Good game my sister loves it
reviews.comment: This is one of the best games I\'ve ever played. Both my sister and I loved it
reviews.author: Rondea Dotson

reviews.title: Great game fun and entertaining the ninjas stars are the best
reviews.comment: Awesome game need more powers though like knives and a turret for the truck Lolz
reviews.author: Blake Brossette

reviews.title: I love this game
reviews.comment: This game is great. Its so fun I love to play it and so do my kids. I highly recommend it.
reviews.author: Erin Foster

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Lol the new update is freaking awesome! Lol I don\'t wanna spoil it for new players, but the new additions are hilarious! One huge addition startled me. Runs great! You guys have a terrific game!
reviews.author: tanisha freeman

reviews.title: Addictive, but fun
reviews.comment: Cute game that is very entertaining, although a bit addictive. Never want to stop!!
reviews.author: Ofelia Lam

reviews.title: Great Game but..........
reviews.comment: The achievements such the nuke, mission, and repair kit use never show as done for the Mpoints. I liked the old scoring method because not all the bears get counted or yield coins. But it is totally a cool game!! Worth the download!!
reviews.author: Beth Edge

reviews.title: A fun, somewhat addictive game.
reviews.comment: My nephew started me on this game.... now I have a hard time not playing XD
reviews.author: Meagan Johnson

reviews.title: Hilarious fun!
reviews.comment: This game is so additive, the bears crack me up. Great game.
reviews.author: Marquette Brockington

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: It works great little bug. Mpoints launch a nuke once a day says it\'s completed but you don\'t get the Mpoints. Great way to pass time when in waiting rooms
reviews.author: Hali Z

reviews.title: I loved the original
reviews.comment: However, I don\'t like the new scrolling menu for ammo. I much preferred the old style.
reviews.author: Kim Larsen

reviews.title: grumpy fan
reviews.comment: I soo love this game my son also enjoy playing the bears really Funny to Knock out.:-)  only thing sometime it shut down but overall it\'s Fun App
reviews.author: Ciara Samuels

reviews.title: Total blast
reviews.comment: Addicting, humorous, cartoon violence. Great graphics and superb gameplay. What are you waiting for? Get this game, you won\'t regret it.  Motorola Droid 4
reviews.author: Tara Hines

reviews.title: Good  - once you figure out how to play
reviews.comment: Would be better if it had instructions.  I\'ve been playing about a week and just now getting the hang of it.
reviews.author: Ruth Joyner

reviews.title: Cant save progress
reviews.comment: Great app but cant save progress if you switch to a new phone. Have to start over from scratch. Can you link it to Facebook or create an account to save our progress???
reviews.author: Cieara Speller

reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: Definitely impressed with the update. The M points are much better improved as well although the nuke achievement still doesnt work! My home screen app keeps disappearing but its still on my phone..
reviews.author: Frederick Konruff

reviews.title: Fun way to kill some time
reviews.comment: A fun & cute way to kill some time.
reviews.author: Carlo Settineri

reviews.title: Excellantly Awesome
reviews.comment: This has got to be the most fun, challanging and addictive game I\'ve run across in a long time.  The various teddys and tools make it a real time occupier that is just fun and fun and fun.
reviews.author: Jerry Rogers

reviews.title: Will not load
reviews.comment: Ive tryed installing a few times and when it gets to 100% it doesnt do anything else. Very disapointed and i will not be getting this app.
reviews.author: Joey Shoemaker

reviews.comment: I love this game good job! Hope theirs more like it.
reviews.author: Jessie Rodriguez

reviews.title: Throwing things at angry bears
reviews.comment: Great stress reliever. Few time delay glitches, but good game overall
reviews.author: Teja Fuller
